snippet.title: Urban Cards Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1126890/Urban_Cards/
Itchio:
https://hues.itch.io/urbancards
Urban Cards is a socio-economic, deck building strategy card game, with a Roguelike infuse. Your goal is to build a deck full of Businesses, Workers, and Henchmen to make money, and undermine your competitors as you work your way through the campaign.
